content: रुह् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (रोहति, रुरोह, अरुक्षत्, रोक्ष्यति, रोढुं, रूढ) {@--1@} To grow, spring up, shoot forth, germinate; रूढरागप्रवालः <ls>M. 4. 1</ls>; केसरैरर्धरूढैः <ls>Me. 21</ls>; छिन्नोऽपि रोहति तरुः <ls>Bh. 2. 87.</ls> {@--2@} To grow up, be developed, increase. {@--3@} To rise, mount upwards, ascend. {@--4@} To grow over, heal up (as a wound); रोहते सायकैर्विद्धं न संरोहति वाक्क्षतं <ls>Pt. 3. 111.</ls> {@--5@} To reach to, attain. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (रोपयति-ते|रोहयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to grow, plant, put in the ground. {@--2@} To raise up, elevate. {@--3@} To entrust, devolve upon, commit to the care of; गुणवत्सुतरोपितश्रियः <ls>R. 8. 11.</ls> {@--4@} To fix upon, direct towards, cast at; <ls>R. 9. 17.</ls> {@--5@} To fix, fasten. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (रुरुक्षति) To wish to grow &c.
रुह्, रुह {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Growing or produced in; as in महीरुह्, पंकेरुह &c.
